1{-# LANGUAGE ScopedTypeVariables #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Term-content expression.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Data.Church.Cox
7  ( -- * Data types
8    Cox (..), Cox2, Cox3, Cox4,
9    MaybeCox, NamedCox, CopCalc, CoxTag,
10  
11    -- * Functions
12    coxLit,
13    coxSyntacticArity,
14    coxMap, coxCall,
15    checkIrreducible,
16  
17    -- * Process
18    -- $Process
19  ) where
20
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture             as O
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                 as B
23import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax               as S
24import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Church.Message  as Msg
25
26
27-- ----------------------  Expression
28
29-- | Term-content expressions.
30data Cox c
31    = CoxLit   [B.CodePt] c                        -- ^ Literal content
32    | CoxTerm  [B.CodePt] [S.TermName] [Int]       -- ^ Term reference, its name and position
33    | CoxCalc  [B.CodePt] S.BlankName (CopCalc c)  -- ^ Content calculator
34    | CoxLocal [B.CodePt] String Int               -- ^ Local blank, its name and De Bruijn index
35    | CoxBlank [B.CodePt] S.BlankName              -- ^ Blank in form
36    | CoxFill  [B.CodePt] (Cox c) [Cox c]          -- ^ Fill args in a form
37    | CoxForm1 [B.CodePt] CoxTag  String  (Cox c)  -- ^ Form with single blank
38    | CoxForm  [B.CodePt] CoxTag [String] (Cox c)  -- ^ Form with multiple blanks
39    | CoxWith  [B.CodePt] [NamedCox c] (Cox c)     -- ^ Cox with outside arguments
40
41-- | Expression pair.
42type Cox2 c = (Cox c, Cox c)
43
44-- | Expression triple.
45type Cox3 c = (Cox c, Cox c, Cox c)
46
47-- | Expression quadruple.
48type Cox4 c = (Cox c, Cox c, Cox c, Cox c)
49
50-- | Maybe expression.
51type MaybeCox c = Maybe (Cox c)
52
53-- | Named expression.
54type NamedCox c = B.Named (Cox c)
55
56-- | Term-content calculator.
57type CopCalc c = [B.Ab c] -> B.Ab c
58
59-- | Expression tag.
60type CoxTag = Maybe String
61
62instance B.CodePtr (Cox c) where
63    codePtList (CoxLit    cp _)       = cp
64    codePtList (CoxTerm   cp _ _)     = cp
65    codePtList (CoxCalc   cp _ _)     = cp
66    codePtList (CoxLocal  cp _ _)     = cp
67    codePtList (CoxBlank  cp _)       = cp
68    codePtList (CoxFill   cp _ _)     = cp
69    codePtList (CoxForm1  cp _ _ _)   = cp
70    codePtList (CoxForm   cp _ _ _)   = cp
71    codePtList (CoxWith   cp _ _)     = cp
72
73instance (B.MixShortEncode c) => Show (Cox c) where
74    show = show . coxToDoc B.noShorten
75
76coxToDoc :: (B.MixShortEncode c) => B.Shorten -> Cox c -> B.Doc
77coxToDoc sh = d (0 :: Int) . coxFold where
78    encode = B.pprint . B.mixToFlatString . B.mixShortEncode sh
79
80    d 10 _ = B.pprint "..."
81    d n e  = case e of
82        CoxLit    _ c          -> B.pprint "lit"    B.<+> encode c
83        CoxTerm   _ ns _       -> B.pprint $ concatMap ('/' :) ns
84        CoxCalc   _ op _       -> B.pprint "calc"   B.<+> blankNameToDoc op
85        CoxLocal  _ v i        -> B.pprint "local"  B.<+> (B.pprint v B.<> B.pprint "/" B.<> B.pprint i)
86        CoxBlank  _ v          -> B.pprint "global" B.<+> blankNameToDoc v
87        CoxFill   _ f xs       -> let f'  = B.pprint ">>" B.<+> d' f
88                                      xs' = B.nest 3 $ B.pprintV $ map arg xs
89                                  in f' B.$$ xs'
90        CoxForm1  _ tag v  e2  -> form tag [v] $ d' e2
91        CoxForm   _ tag vs e2  -> form tag vs  $ d' e2
92        CoxWith   _ _ e2       -> d' e2
93      where
94        d'                      = d $ n + 1
95        arg                     = (B.pprint "-" B.<+>) . d'
96        form (Nothing)  vs      = form2 vs
97        form (Just tag) vs      = form2 $ ("'" ++ tag) : vs
98        form2 vs e2             = B.pprintWraps "(|" "|)" $ B.pprintH vs B.<+> B.pprint "|" B.<+> e2
99
100blankNameToDoc :: S.BlankName -> B.Doc
101blankNameToDoc (S.BlankNormal   n) = B.pprint n
102blankNameToDoc (S.BlankInternal n) = B.pprint n
103blankNameToDoc (S.BlankPrefix   n) = B.pprint n B.<+> B.pprint "(prefix)"
104blankNameToDoc (S.BlankInfix    n) = B.pprint n B.<+> B.pprint "(infix)"
105blankNameToDoc (S.BlankPostfix  n) = B.pprint n B.<+> B.pprint "(postfix)"
106
107-- | Create literal expression.
108coxLit :: c -> Cox c
109coxLit = CoxLit []
110
111-- Convert CoxForm1 to CoxForm.
112coxFold :: O.Map (Cox c)
113coxFold (CoxForm1 cp1 tag1 v1 e1) =
114    case coxFold e1 of
115      CoxForm _ tag2 vs e2 | tag1 == tag2  ->  CoxForm cp1 tag1 (v1:vs) e2
116      e2                                   ->  CoxForm cp1 tag1 [v1]    e2
117coxFold (CoxFill cp f xs) = CoxFill cp (coxFold f) (map coxFold xs)
118coxFold e = e
119
120isCoxForm :: Cox c -> Bool
121isCoxForm (CoxForm1  _ _ _ _)  = True
122isCoxForm (CoxForm   _ _ _ _)  = True
123isCoxForm _                    = False
124
125-- | Get arity of expression.
126coxSyntacticArity :: Cox c -> Int
127coxSyntacticArity = loop where
128    loop (CoxForm   _ _ vs cox)  = loop cox + length vs
129    loop (CoxForm1  _ _ _  cox)  = loop cox + 1
130    loop (CoxFill _ cox xs)
131        | isCoxForm cox  = loop cox - length xs
132        | otherwise      = 0
133    loop _ = 0
134
135-- | Map expression form.
136coxMap :: O.Map (O.Map (Cox c))
137coxMap g (CoxFill  cp f xs)         = CoxFill  cp (g f) (map g xs)
138coxMap g (CoxForm1 cp tag v  body)  = CoxForm1 cp tag v  (g body)
139coxMap g (CoxForm  cp tag vs body)  = CoxForm  cp tag vs (g body)
140coxMap _ e = e
141
142-- | Fill expression form.
143coxCall :: Cox c -> (O.Map (Cox c)) -> Cox c
144coxCall cox g = coxMap g cox
145
146-- | Check irreducible expression.
147checkIrreducible :: B.AbMap (Cox c)
148checkIrreducible e
149    | irreducible e  = Right e
150    | otherwise      = Msg.abCoxIrrep [e] $
151                       Msg.unkCox "Not irreducible"
152
153-- irreducible representation
154irreducible :: Cox c -> Bool
155irreducible cox =
156    case cox of
157      CoxLit  _ _       -> True
158      CoxTerm _ _ _     -> True
159      CoxCalc _ _ _     -> True
160      CoxFill _ f xs    -> all irreducible $ f : xs
161      _                 -> False
162
163
164-- ----------------------
165-- $Process
166--
167--  /Phase 1/. Convert input string into token trees.
168--
169--    [1. 'String'@ -> \[@'B.Token'@\]@]
170--        Parse input string into a list of tokens.
171--
172--    [2. @\[@'B.Token'@\] -> \[@'BTree.TTree'@\]@]
173--        Analyze token list structure.
174--
175--    [3. @\[@'BTree.TTree'@\] -> @'BTree.TTree']
176--        Wrap the list of token trees in a tree.
177--
178--  /Phase 2/. Transform token trees,
179--             and convert into abstract syntax trees.
180--             See "Koshucode.Baala.Data.Content.Build" module.
181--
182--    [4. 'BTree.TTree'@ -> @'BTree.TTree']
183--       Expand tree-level syntax operators.
184--
185--    [5. 'BTree.TTree'@ -> @'BTree.TTree']
186--       Transform binary operators from infix to prefix.
187--
188--    [6. 'BTree.TTree'@ -> @'Cox' @c@]
189--       Convert token tree into an abstract syntax tree.
190--
191--    [7. 'Cox' @c -> @'Cox'@ c@]
192--       Attach De Bruijn indecies for bound variables.
193--
194--    [8. 'Cox' @c -> @'Cox' @c@]
195--       Expand expression-level syntax operators.
196--
197--  /Phase 3/. Calculate content expressions.
198--             See "Koshucode.Baala.Data.Content.Run" module.
199--
200--    [9. 'B.Relhead'@ -> @'Cox'@ c -> @'Cox'@ c@]
201--       Attach term positions using actural heading of relation.
202--
203--    [10. 'CopSet'@ c -> \[@'NamedCox'@ c\] -> @'Cox'@ c -> @'Cox'@ c@]
204--       Replace base and derived operators into its bodies.
205--
206--    [11. 'Cox'@ c -> Beta c@]
207--       Reduce derived expressions into beta expressions.
208--
209--    [12. @Beta c -> \[c\] -> c@]
210--       Run beta expression for each association of relation.
211--
